item.title: Since Some Fags think i cant code heres my urlclassloader
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

<3 RLN he helps me alot of times coz i ask simple noobiestuff

/** * Runescape Client Loader * Using URLClassLoader * Usage: java -cp . MyLoader client */

import java.net.;
import java.io.;
import java.lang.reflect.*;

public class MyLoader {
public static void main (String argv[]) throws Exception {
System.out.println(“Bot Updating”);
URLClassLoader loader = new URLClassLoader(new URL[] { new URL(“http://po4.runescape.com/runescape.jar”) });

  Class c = loader.loadClass (argv[0]);
  
  Method m = c.getMethod("main", new Class[] { argv.getClass() });
  int mods = m.getModifiers();
  if(m.getReturnType() != void.class || !Modifier.isStatic(mods) || !Modifier.isPublic(mods)) {
     throw new NoSuchMethodException("main");
  }
  try {
     m.invoke("main", (Object)new String[] {"4", "live",  "live", "lowmem", "free", "english"});
     System.out.println("Bot Updated Now Loading");
  } catch(IllegalAccessException e) {
  }

}
}

run.bat

java -cp . MyLoader client
[br][size=1]Posted at: September 09, 2006, 08:58:39 AM[/size][hr]NOTE: i gave you the loader so you can do the rest yourself

Read full topic
